trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_Q1_000_000<tab>What would you like to do?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_A1_000_001<tab>Enhance Eureka weapon with mnemes.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_A1_000_002<tab>Read the manual.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_A1_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>You do not possess a Eureka weapon which can be enhanced with mnemes.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_Q1_001_000<tab>Select a Eureka weapon.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_A1_001_001<tab><var 28 ((Item)) E8020A /var>.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_A1_001_002<tab>Cancel.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You do not have the required <var 31 ((Item)) 04F25E3A0302 /var> to enhance <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> with mnemes.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>In order to enhance <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var> with mnemes, <var 08 E803 ((<var 08 E2E8030B ((<var 09 E803 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04F25E3A0302 /var> are required.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_YESNO_000<tab>Extract and transubstantiate mnemes from <var 08 E803 ((<var 08 E2E8030B ((<var 09 E803 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04F25E3A0302 /var> in order to enhance <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>?

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_YESNO_001<tab>Once again extract and transubstantiate mnemes from <var 08 E803 ((<var 08 E2E8030B ((<var 09 E803 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E803 /var>)) /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04F25E3A0302 /var> in order to enhance <var 31 ((Item)) 03E8020202 /var>?
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_Q2_000_000<tab>Select a topic.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_A2_000_001<tab>Enhancing Eureka weapons with mnemes.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_A2_000_002<tab>Required materials.
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_A2_000_003<tab>Return.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_MANUAL00539_000_020<tab>(-Mnemeworks Manual-)“It is strongly recommended that you familiarize yourself with all aspects of the mnemeworks station before attempting to enhance an armament. Failure to do so may lead to catastrophic failure and/or grievous bodily harm and/or death...”
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>Through the use of the mnemeworks, you may imbue your Pyros weapon with additional properties.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>The strength and nature of these properties will be determined at random. Moreover, should you possess sufficient materials, this process may be repeated.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_MANUAL00539_000_030<tab>(-Mnemeworks Manual-)“Please ensure you have sufficient <var 31 ((Item)) 04F25E3A0302 /var> before utilizing the mnemeworks station. Failure to do so may lead to catastrophic failure and/or grievous bodily harm and/or death...”
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_SYSTEM_000_031<tab>In order to enhance a Pyros weapon, you must possess the requisite quantity of <var 31 ((Item)) 04F25E3A0302 /var>.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_SYSTEM_000_032<tab>This quantity will vary depending on the weapon in question. A paladin's arm requires <var 08 E802 ((<var 08 E2E8020B ((<var 09 E802 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E802 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E802 /var>)) /var>, as does a shield. All other weapons require <var 08 E804 ((<var 08 E2E8040B ((<var 09 E804 ((one)) ((two)) ((three)) ((four)) ((five)) ((six)) ((seven)) ((eight)) ((nine)) ((ten)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E804 /var>)) /var>)) ((<var 20 E804 /var>)) /var> <var 31 ((Item)) 04F25E3A0302 /var>.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_SYSTEM_000_033<tab><var 2B ((<var 31 ((Item)) 04F25E3A0302 /var>)) /var> are created by converting accumulated vitiated aether with the aid of a Mark II crystal forge.

TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3ADJUSTTOOL_00539_SYSTEM_000_034<tab>Please be advised that <var 31 ((Item)) 04F25E3A0302 /var> can only be obtained via the Mark II crystal forge located in <var 28 ((ContentFinderCondition)) E8022A /var>, and that crystal forges located elsewhere will not yield this material.
